com.janrain.android.engage.types.JRImageMediaObject Class Reference

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 JRImageMediaObject (String src, String href)

Detailed Description

Image object to be included in a post to a user's stream.

Create an image media object, fill in the object's fields, and add the object to the JRActivityObject.media array in your JRActivityObject. How the images get presented and whether or not they are used, depend on the provider.

Each image must contain a src URL, which maps to the photo's URL, and an href URL, which maps to the URL where a user should be taken if he or she clicks the photo.

Format and rules are identical to those described on the Facebook Developer page on Attachments.

Constructor

com.janrain.android.engage.types.JRImageMediaObject.JRImageMediaObject ( String  src,
String  href 
)

Creates a JRImageMediaObject initialized with the given src and href.

Parameters:
src The photo's URL. This value cannot be null.
href The URL where a user should be taken if he or she clicks the photo. This value cannot be null.
Exceptions:
IllegalArgumentException if src or href is null
